mulinma kiyanna oona gabsawa kiyana mathrukawa lingika adyapanayata kohethma adala na kiyala.uda chita kiyala thiyanawa wage bahutharayak gabsa kara ganne nithyanukuula widiyata lingikawa ekathu wela habayi eken ena athurupalaya raka ganna aarthika hayiyak nathi ehema naththan palaweni daruwa thamath kiri bona wayase inna wiwahaka ammala.kiyanna dukayi wadi hariyak gubbayam wala mesa uda elowa yanne sujatha puththu.ehema awiwahaka ammala karana gabsaweth nodanuwath kama nisa gab gaththa kenek innawa nam ee lakshekata ekak wage.boho welawata wenne athwaradim ee aya niyama upath palana krama anugamanaya karalath wena atha waradim.udaharanayak widiyata gahaniyage nisaru kalaye sidukarana sansargayakin gab ganimak siduwiya haki wima.mathaka thiya ganna dan hama thanama upath palana upakarana miladi ganna thiyanawa.
